MAIN_MESSAGE: here is a power cut in the LL65postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Tre Ifan Estate and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 3:36AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault  and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:45AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4AM on 09 November 2020.
